book.synopsis: In Victorian-era England, a young girl, Emma, who is rescued from a life of destitution and raised to become a proper British maid, falls in love with William, the eldest son of a wealthy family, but the strict rules of their society force them to keep their romance a secret.
book.dimensions: Height: 7.5 Inches, Length: 5 Inches, Weight: 0.35 Pounds, Width: 0.5 Inches
